item.title: TGIF
item.description: Cocktail Hour Here at The Internet Shipyards, Friday night is cocktail night. Today’s special guest: the Rusty Nail, also known as the World’s Simplest Cocktail. 1 part Drambuie 1 part cheap scotch I can’t overstate how cheap the scotch should be. If it doesn’t come in a bottle with a white label that says “SCOTCH” on it, it’s probably too fancy for this cocktail. Cheers 🙂
